title: Hungary Outlook Cut to Negative at Fitch on Election Budget
description: Fitch Ratings cut the outlook on Hungary’s credit score to negative from stable, after a loosening of budget targets to accommodate Prime Minister Viktor Orban’s pre-election spending.
content: Fitch Ratings cut the outlook on Hungary’s credit score to negative from stable, after a loosening of budget targets to accommodate Prime Minister Viktor Orban’s pre-election spending.
